extracted_metadata.title: Return Conference \ Panel: Strategies for Promoting Return \English Dubbing
extracted_metadata.description: ***From Truth to Redress: Realizing the Return of Palestinian Refugees International Conference in Tel Aviv, September 29-30 2013*** Panel: Strategies for Promoting Return - The Challenge Faced by Palestinian and Israeli Societies and the International Community Chair: Liat Rosenberg -- Director of Zochrot. The Responsibility of Palestinian Society and Organizations to Realize the Right of Return / Khulood Badawi - Palestinian civil rights activist, Nazareth. Civil Society: promoting refugee rights and countering collective inertia / William Bell - Christian Aid, UK. Strategies and Recommendations for Israeli NGOs on Realizing Return and Promoting Justice / D. Manar Makhoul - BADIL - Resource Center for Palestinian Residency & Refugee Rights, Bethlehem. The Return as a Demon: How to Cope with the Israeli Dread / Gidon Levy -- Journalist, Tel Aviv. Q&A *** Read more about the conference: http://zochrot.org/en/menu/%D7%96%D7%... *** To watch the panel in Hebrew: • כנס השיבה / זוכרות / פאנל: "אסטרטגיות לקיד... To watch the panel in Arabic: • مؤتمر العودة / ذاكرات (زوخروت) - جلسة: "اس...
